body: I made the change here in frequencies.pxd, which presumably means that now frequencies can also be specified with a '+' sign. Maybe this is not desired, in which case I could include a modified version of the `opattern` regexp in the to_offset function itself.
Should the whatsnew entry go in "Other API changes"?
Also, does this need a separate issue?
